Question 97) Centrifuges are equipment used in laboratories, clinics and industries. Its operation makes use of centrifugal acceleration obtained by rotating a container and which serves to separate solids in suspension in liquids or liquids mixed with each other.
In this device, the separation of substances occurs as a function
A) the different densities.
B) the different rays of rotation.
C) of the different angular speeds.
D) the different quantities of each substance.
E) the different molecular cohesion of each substance.
